title: can ANYONE explain to me why im chat restricted
body:
so i went jhin JGL for something spicy. camille immediately said GG15 and started to be toxic in lobby. upon getting into game she refused to leashe, whenever i went to gank her lane she just ran the opposite direction (even on full health) she literally inted in a couple of parts of the game. the only thing i can think i got chat restricted for was "dont be a shit c***" which was said to my mid laner who said were gonna lose. i said this not seriously, but in a banter way (as the mid laner seemed friendly).  it even says on the 'tips' in loading screen "Competitive BSing is fine. Hate speech? Not so much." which is what i thought it was.
so throughout the game i said report the camille and explained why... and yet i get chat restricted and go from honor 3 to honor 1. i dont really think i deserved a chat game restriction for this, ill include an explanation for some context
Game 1
DojoBaggins: well if you want have a chance to win the game (camille said she wont leashe)
DojoBaggins: youll leashe(me saying she should leashe)
DojoBaggins: just dont be a shit %%%%(our mid lane said jokingly ff15 i believe, so jokingly said this to him he was a nice person, he didnt say it in a toxic i give up way)
DojoBaggins: dont know him(ryze asked if me and camille were premade)
DojoBaggins: just toxic (i dont know him (camille) just toxic)
DojoBaggins: yeah man jsut report camille and ff15 XD (didnt leashe)
DojoBaggins: also can you report camille, toxic af (all chat)
DojoBaggins: so camille just runs away when i go to gank (all chat)
DojoBaggins: shes so toxic cause iw ent jhin jgl (someone asked why shes toxic, my reply)
DojoBaggins: now camille is trolling (all chat) 
DojoBaggins: and inting (she just inted)
DojoBaggins: shes jsut trolling dude calm down XD (someone on my team was like wtf camille etc)
DojoBaggins: can you poke? (me going for a gank on caitlyn needed to get them lower so i can hit W aswell)
DojoBaggins: no point (they warded and knew i was there)
DojoBaggins: camille is 100% troll (she tolled again)
DojoBaggins: the funny thing is(self explanatory)
DojoBaggins: Were not playing that bad(self explanatory)
DojoBaggins: were just losing cause camilles troollling(Self explanatory
DojoBaggins: im nmot(enemy team said i was toxic
DojoBaggins: she legit just refused to leashe, flamed us in lobby. and whenever iw ent to gank (explaining how shes toxic)
DojoBaggins: she jsut ran away (again)
DojoBaggins: not to mention shes inting (again)
DojoBaggins: so if youre blaming me for what shes doing, enjoy playing with trolls in future (me getting blamed for something)
DojoBaggins: guys back me up here (enemy team said if what i was saying was true, my team would say it aswell)
DojoBaggins: i feel like if i was lieing, the camille would be defending herself (my response)
DojoBaggins: by all means ill send you a video before you leave lobby (they didnt wanna report her as they didnt believe me because she was acting innocent to them)
DojoBaggins: so what have i said thats been toxic (they said they gonna report me for toxic
DojoBaggins: telling you to report a troll? (im toxic because i said report a troll?)
DojoBaggins: wel;l generally if i say it once, no one reoprted them (self explanatory)
DojoBaggins: reports* (correcting above)

replies.body:
because riot wants to perm ban accounts so players make more accounts and spend money :').  

Support will tell you that it's best not to say anything at all and although you werent toxic youre behavior still has a negative impact on the game and you typing is preventing you from playing.

if you read the post. unless youre refering to my pick itself getting the camille 'rilled' up then youve read it wrong. i did not BM them initially.
also youre saying no one likes to be put at a disadvantage. and youre 100% right. but refusing to leashe a jungler who really needs it is only putting them at an even bigger disadvantage.

and so far in MOST games junglers dont punish me cause im jhin. meaning i can pull off somewhat decent ganks from a distance with my W and R. and once i hit 2 items, i become pretty strong with my powerspike. im not saying its strong but im sure atleast once in your life youve done an off meta pick for a lane.

further more with appropriate warding and pressure in lanes, when i do in as a premade. we often count on the enemy jungler coming into my jungle and set it up as a trap

Yea? why dont you go to rank and try it. You know it is a terrible pick deep inside. 
Strong duelist jglers will destroy you, i dont think you can even take scuttle at all. Not unless your mid is winning and carrying a useless pick.
 
Dont feed me nonesense. Power spike? and how long would that take?. Before the xin build a tabi and run you out of ur jgl, while your mid has to lane. 

People have to carry you for you to win with that pick, Or you are vsing players whose rank is substantially bellow your.

Taking all that into consideration. Your troll pick is no morale booster. If anything, it is like a prelude to failures.

But prove me wrong, climb the ladder with it.

mate you need to calm down. im not saying its the next meta breaking thing. im just saying its not as bad as you say. with stacking traps rapters and a leashe on red. you clear your first 2 camp really fast. and with a bit of practice ive got my first clear down to just 2 seconds slower than a kayn. i've definitely won alot more games than ive lost with it. and yeah i get people might be a bit hesitant and be like oooo spicy wtf XD. and even early game (Depending on the enemy jgler) you can go for an invade. theres nothing wrong with going 'troll' picks in norms. but there is something wrong with trolling. again. have you ever gone an 'off meta' build?
Wouldn't bother with this guy.. Literally takes context out of anything he can to instigate an argument to feel superior. honestly.

yep you were right. i still think its a pretty silly punishment for a silly crime. an email saying "hey just leading know these kind of actions will get your punished" would have been enough. i worked my but off to get honor 3. and now im down to 1. just because someone decided to troll. riot said "ill see they get punished" but its a shame theres not guaranteed way to see that anything actually happened

Prolly won't see them get punished, Riot won't manually punish them because they think their system is more efficient due to the IFS banning based on "constant" behavior instead of a one off game where they may been negative. in 90% of cases, you'll see the punished ones getting banned opposed to the ones who are really causing the loss. 
I rather have a flamer who wants to win rather than an afk farming jungle and occasional inting.
100% agree. id rather have a flamer who listens to pings, wants to win, and helps in team fights than a malphite top who doesnt press R and doesnt say a thing all game who just splitpushes 24/7

well i got a response. is till dont agree that the punishment fits the crime. a simple "hey dont do that" would have sufficed.
Hey there!

Thank you for writing in. Eesh, behavior like that definitely isn't okay, I'm really sorry you had to deal with that. I'll take a look at this for you and make sure they're dealt with. I won't be able to share any info about what happens due to our stance on privacy, but I really do appreciate you taking the time to write in to us and report the behavior.

As for your penalty though I am seeing a bit of negativity here, a lot of your chat here is unnecessary and not constructive to the game. It only takes a single report for the system to flag a game, so calling for reports can be seen as a bit of harassment, I'd really just recommend ignoring or possibly muting the player and reporting them after the game. If they're being negative, they'll be penalized, there isn't much point in engaging with them. Continuing to just go on and on just really isn't necessary here. A 10-Game chat restriction is our lightest penalty and just meant to warn a summoner that they exhibited negativity in a recent game, so I know the behavior may not seem severe but we're just trying to nudge you in the right direction.

If you have any other questions I can help you out with please let me know, thank you.

*************
Riot Games Player Support

season ends in November (if its anything like previous seasons)

so you have 5 months to get 6 checkpoints, based on your 1-2 months, i severely doubt you'll get back to honor 3 by then
Good luck climbing back to honor 3 before season end, honor takes way too long to grind up now
i had a look at my honor, ive got 3 checkpoints to level 2. then 3 more checkpoints to get to level 3. it takes me like 1-2 months to get 1 checkpoint XD
